common

array.hh File Reference

Detailed Description

A dynamical array class, similar to std::vector.

Deprecated:
Use std::vector instead of Dune::Array

#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <string>
#include <cassert>
#include <rpc/rpc.h>
#include "exceptions.hh"
